name: larky
content:

full of or creating enjoyment and entertainment: The movie has its larky moments, but the dominant mood is melancholy, even dark. As larky and carefree as Poppy is, she's certainly no airhead.
More examplesFewer examplesIn a larky mood, she lifted her daughter up off the floor and danced around the room with her.They are very possibly the larkiest, funniest bunch of pop stars since the Beatles. The youthful cast performed the show with larky high spirits.
